trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma exibição de tempo de design de dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> class using the provided data source designer and name of the view.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> usando o designer de fonte de dados fornecido e o nome do modo de exibição de classe.

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the view in the data source.
trans-unit.target: O nome da exibição da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto associado atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto oferece suporte a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>método tem suporte; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto associado atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto oferece suporte a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>método tem suporte; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports paging through the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto associado atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto oferece suporte à paginação através dos dados recuperados com o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging through the data retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados recuperados pela paginação a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>método tem suporte; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports retrieving the total number of data rows instead of the data itself.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto associado atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto oferece suporte ao recuperar o número total de linhas de dados em vez dos dados em si.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if retrieving the total number of data rows is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>há suporte para se recuperar o número total de linhas de dados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports a sorted view on the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto associado atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto oferece suporte a uma exibição classificada na fonte de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a sorted view on the underlying data source is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma exibição classificada na fonte de dados subjacente é suportada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto associado atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto oferece suporte a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>método tem suporte; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control using the provided number of rows and returns a value indicating whether the data is sample or real data.
trans-unit.target: Gera dados de tempo de design que coincide com o esquema do controle de fonte de dados associados usando o número fornecido de linhas e retorna um valor que indica se os dados de exemplo ou dados reais.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to return.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de linhas a serem retornadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que os dados retornados são os dados de exemplo; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para indicar que os dados retornados são dados reais.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object containing data to display at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que contém dados a serem exibidos em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets a schema that describes the data source view that is represented by this view object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um esquema que descreve a exibição da fonte de dados que é representada por esse objeto de exibição.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"> </xref> objeto.
